title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.9 - Accrual reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.9 - Accrual reporting

State Regulations

The recognizing and reporting of the effects of
transactions and other events on the assets and liabilities of the hospital
entity in the time period to which they relate, rather than only when cash is
received or paid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
